title: Raiden

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-**Smite:** Smite a player. They will be dealt an unstoppable attack instantly. (1 night cooldown)
-**Jolt:** Resurrect a Kombat member, as well as giving them hang immunity for the next day. They may use their ability twice, but will die at the end of the next night. (1 use)
-**Empower:** Use your electricity to give another member unlimited power for that night. They gain all immunities, as well as having their attack upgraded to powerful. (2 uses, 1 night cooldown)
-**Zeus’s Judgement:** If the game has lasted to day 15, then you may deal a basic attack to every non-kombatant alive. This may only be done once, and will also deal piercing damage to yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If this role spawns, this will be the only Kombat Killing role in the game
-You may not target the same player with empower twice in a row.
**X-RAY:** Zeus’s Judgement no longer kills you, and the day is reduced to day 10. You also gain infinite empower uses and lose the cooldown on Smite
